definition: having official authority or sanction, someone who administers the rules of a game or sport
details:
adjective
- having official authority or sanction
= example: having official authority or sanction
- verified officially
= example: verified officially
- (of a church) given official status as a national or state institution
- conforming to set usage, procedure, or discipline
= synonyms: prescribed
- of or relating to an office
= example: of or relating to an office
noun
- someone who administers the rules of a game or sport
= example: someone who administers the rules of a game or sport
- a worker who holds or is invested with an office
= synonyms: functionary
